overview:
Tao Liang is the Chief Architect at Content Circles, and has over 10 years of experience developing and commercializing new document and content management technologies at Xerox.

Prior to co-founding Content Circles, Tao was Manager of Advanced Products for the DocuShare Business Unit at Xerox. In this role, he managed a team of developers and delivered innovative new content management software products and services.

Tao also managed strategic technology partnerships with various Xerox research centers as well as key external technology partners such as NASA.

Prior to DocuShare, Tao was a Principal, New Business Development at the Internet Business Group of Xerox; and a researcher at the renowned Xerox Palo Alto Research Center (PARC) with a focus on social technologies for enabling distributed collaboration, knowledge sharing and digital rights management. Tao received a Ph.D. from Stanford University and a BS from Drexel University.

relationships.title: Manager of Advanced Products, DocuShare Business Unit
